carst package¶

carst.functions module¶

class carst.functions.FunctionContainer(options, wanted_funcs)[source]¶

Bases: collections.UserDict

Mapping to hold functions required for modelling.

Inherits dict/UserDict to allow easy access to parent data. Note that only carst.functions.carst_funcs values are acceptable as keys.

Parameters

  • options (carst.options.CarstOptions) – The CarstOptions instance the model is working off. Needed for supplementary data.

  • wanted_funcs (Sequence[carst.functions.carst_funcs]) – The collection of carst_funcs which specifies which function types the object should contain.

Returns

An initialised carst.functions.FunctionContainer instance. The functions are still blank (ie. not interpolated).

interpolate(options, *function_names)[source]¶

Interpolate the functions contained in the module by one time step.

Parameters

  • options (carst.options.CarstOptions) – The options set that the model is currently working on.

  • function_names (Sequence[carst.functions.carst_funcs]) – The functions to be interpolated.

class carst.functions.carst_funcs[source]¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Enumerator to correspond to the functions the model relies on.

depth = 6¶
diff_coeff = 7¶
light_attenuation = 8¶
limiter = 4¶
sea_level = 9¶
sed = 1¶
sed_old = 2¶
surface = 3¶
thickness = 5¶

carst.options module¶

class carst.options.CarstOptions(ini_type, *args, **kw_args)[source]¶

Bases: collections.UserDict

Takes various forms of input and stores it in a form expected by carst.solver.CarstModel.

Parameters

  • ini_type (carst.options.initialisation_method) – The method to use for gathering data.

  • args (Iterable) – See below.

If ini_type is carst.options.initialisation_method.raw_values, args should contain:

  • The base mesh on which the model will operate, of type firedrake.mesh.MeshGeometry.

  • A function which takes arguments representing the coordinate space and function space of the model’s workspace, and returns a firedrake object describing the shape of the seabed.

  • A str representation of the sea level (typically as a function of time). See the string representation table for more info.

  • A collection containing the times (float) for the model, ie. (current_time, time_step, output_time), in that order.

  • A (relative) path to the directory to be used for output.

class carst.options.initialisation_method[source]¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Enum for specifying to carst.options.CarstOptions where you want the initialisation data to come from.

diamond_default = 2¶
raw_values = 1¶

carst.output module¶

class carst.output.OutputFilesCollection(output_folder)[source]¶

Bases: object

A container for firedrake File objects.

Parameters

output_folder (str) – The relative file path to the directory the output files should be stored in.

output(funcs, options, names=None)[source]¶

Write the current status of the model’s functions to the output files stored in this container.

Parameters

  • funcs (carst.functions.FunctionContainer) – The FunctionContainer instance which OutputFilesCollection will use as data.

  • options (carst.options.CarstOptions) – The CarstOptions onject the model is working off.

  • names (Iterable[str]) – Names of files which are to be written to. Should be a subset of (“land”, “layer_data”, “surfaces”, “sea_level”). If not provided, all files will be written to.

carst.processes module¶

carst.processes.DIFFUSION_EQUATION_GENERIC(funcs, options)[source]¶

Generate a firedrake object representing the diffusion equation for the current model.

Parameters

  • funcs (carst.functions.FunctionContainer) – The FunctionContainer instance the model is working from.

  • options (carst.options.CarstOptions) – The CarstOptions instance the model is working from.

Returns

A firedrake Function to be used for solving the diffusion equation with the current model (reusable).

Return type

firedrake.function.Function

carst.processes.advance_carbonates(funcs, options)[source]¶

Perform carbonate simulation over 1 time step.

Parameters

  • funcs (carst.functions.FunctionContainer) – The FunctionContainer instance the model is working from. This is modified in-place.

  • options (carst.options.CarstOptions) – The CarstOptions instance the model is working from.

carst.processes.advance_diffusion(funcs, options)[source]¶

Perform diffusion simulation over 1 time step.

Note that this also performs interpolation over the rest of the FunctionContainer since it is the most basic function of the model.

Parameters

  • funcs (carst.functions.FunctionContainer) – The FunctionContainer instance the model is working from. This is modified in-place.

  • options (carst.options.CarstOptions) – The CarstOptions instance the model is working from.

carst.solver module¶

class carst.solver.CarstModel(options)[source]¶

Bases: object

Simulates sediment formation on the seabed.

advance()[source]¶

Advance the simulation by a single time step.

property coordinate_space¶
Returns

The firedrake object describing the coordinate space the model is operating in.

Return type

firedrake.ufl.geometry.SpacialCoordinate

property funcs¶
Returns

The FunctionContainer object which holds the current status of all the mathematical functions the model is using.

Return type

carst.functions.FunctionContainer

property function_space¶
Returns

The firedrake object describing the function space the model is operating in.

Return type

firedrake.functionspaceimpl.WithGeometry

Returns

The firedrake object containing the land function.

Return type

True if model will write to output files this cycle.
